Name: Open LLM Leaderboard
Short Description: Leaderboard from hugging face on MMLU, hellaswag, and ARC

Name: LLM-Leaderboard
Short Description: Community leaderboard with data from multiple leaderboards and sources

Name: MMLU-by-task

Name: MMLU-by-task dataset

Name: Hugging Face Evaluation Results
Short Description: JSON data of evaluation results on open source LLM models on Hugging Face
